text.section: This title does not apply to a single-passenger, coin-activated amusement ride that is electrically, manually, or mechanically operated unless admission is charged for access to the place where the amusement ride is located.
This title does not repeal or modify § 21-1112 ("Medicine or patent medicine shows") or § 21-1212 ("Violation of § 21-1112") of the Health - General Article.
This title does not prevent the licensing of carnivals, fairs, or amusement attractions by the State or a political subdivision of the State.
This title does not repeal or modify the Maryland Occupational Safety and Health Act.
